dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4959 IH: Land of the Free Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Ross (for herself, Ms. Balint, Ms. Tlaib, Ms. Simon, Mr. Johnson of Georgia, Ms. Scanlon, Ms. Ocasio-Cortez, Ms. Lee of Pennsylvania, Mr. Nadler, and Mrs. Foushee) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend section 237 of the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for an exception related to protected speech activities.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Land of the Free Act of 2025.

section.header: Exception related to protected speech activities
section.text: Section 237(a)(4)(C) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1227(a)(4)(C)) is repealed.
